title: First AMA 2022
description: This is the first AMA in 2022 and it is a good one. We answered several questions and there were a lot of swags and information to go round. Now all users can buy, sell, trade and bid on all ZOOcreatures, including our NFT Animals and our unhatched NFT Eggs with ease.
